content:
From: "ACME Insurance Claims" <claims@acme-insurance.example>
To: "Zhang Wei" <zhang.wei@example.com>
Subject: Re: Auto claim / Sinistre auto - Ref CLM-2026-0212-1048
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:09:00 +0100
Message-ID: <CLM-20260212-150900-1048@acme-insurance.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello Mr. Zhang,

Thanks for your message. Nous allons vous aider à ouvrir le sinistre auto.
To proceed, please confirm:
- Policy number (numéro de police)
- Vehicle plate (immatriculation)
- Date/time and location of the accident (date/heure et lieu)
- Any injuries? (blessés ?)

Best regards,
ACME Insurance Claims Desk


-----Original Message-----
From: "Zhang Wei" <zhang.wei@example.com>
To: "ACME Insurance Claims" <claims@acme-insurance.example>
Subject: Auto accident - need to file a claim / Déclaration sinistre
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:02:11 +0100
Message-ID: <msg-20260212-150211@zhang.wei.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"

Hi, I had a car accident today and I need to file a claim.
Bonjour, je voudrais faire une déclaration de sinistre.

It was a minor collision, no one is hurt.
C’était un petit accrochage, pas de blessés.

Can you tell me what you need from me?
Merci de me dire quels documents il faut.


-----Original Message-----
From: "ACME Insurance Claims" <claims@acme-insurance.example>
To: "Zhang Wei" <zhang.wei@example.com>
Subject: Re: Auto accident - claim intake / Prise en charge sinistre
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:06:48 +0100
Message-ID: <CLM-20260212-150648-1048@acme-insurance.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"

Hello Mr. Zhang,

Thank you. D’accord, merci pour ces précisions.
Please send the following so we can register the claim:
1) Photos of both vehicles and the scene (photos des véhicules et de la scène)
2) The European accident statement if available (constat amiable), even if incomplete
3) Driver’s license + vehicle registration (permis + carte grise)
4) Contact details of the other driver (coordonnées de l’autre conducteur)

Also, quick questions:
- Was the vehicle drivable? (le véhicule roulait encore ?)
- Any police report? (intervention de la police ?)

Kind regards,
ACME Insurance Claims Desk


-----Original Message-----
From: "Zhang Wei" <zhang.wei@example.com>
To: "ACME Insurance Claims" <claims@acme-insurance.example>
Subject: Re: Auto accident - claim intake / Documents
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:10:22 +0100
Message-ID: <msg-20260212-151022@zhang.wei.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"

Hi,

Policy number is LU-AUTO-778899.
Plate is LU-AB1234.

Accident time: today 14:10, near Kirchberg, Luxembourg.
Lieu: Boulevard Kennedy, à côté du parking.

Car is drivable, yes. No police, we exchanged details.
La voiture roule, pas de police, on a échangé les infos.

Other driver: Marie Dupont, +352 621 000 111, marie.dupont@example.com
Her plate: LU-CD5678.

I can send photos and the constat amiable tonight.
Je vous envoie les photos ce soir.


-----Original Message-----
From: "ACME Insurance Claims" <claims@acme-insurance.example>
To: "Zhang Wei" <zhang.wei@example.com>
Subject: Re: Claim registered / Sinistre enregistré - Ref CLM-2026-0212-1048
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:13:05 +0100
Message-ID: <CLM-20260212-151305-1048@acme-insurance.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"

Hello Mr. Zhang,

Your auto claim is now registered. Votre sinistre est enregistré.
Reference: CLM-2026-0212-1048

Next steps / Prochaines étapes:
- Please email the photos + signed constat amiable when ready.
- Once received, we’ll review liability (responsabilité) and coverage (garanties).
- If repairs are needed, you may choose a garage. Nous pouvons aussi vous proposer un garage partenaire.

To speed things up, could you answer:
- Which parts are damaged? (quelles pièces sont endommagées ?)
- Do you need a replacement car? (véhicule de remplacement ?)

Best regards,
ACME Insurance Claims Desk


-----Original Message-----
From: "Zhang Wei" <zhang.wei@example.com>
To: "ACME Insurance Claims" <claims@acme-insurance.example>
Subject: Re: Claim registered / Damage details
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:18:44 +0100
Message-ID: <msg-20260212-151844@zhang.wei.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"

Hi,

Damage: front bumper and left headlight scratched, maybe the sensor.
Dommages: pare-chocs avant + phare gauche rayé.

I don’t need a rental car for now.
Pas besoin de voiture de remplacement.

I’ll send photos + the constat in 2 hours.
Je vous envoie tout dans deux heures, merci.


-----Original Message-----
From: "ACME Insurance Claims" <claims@acme-insurance.example>
To: "Zhang Wei" <zhang.wei@example.com>
Subject: Re: Repair options / Expertise - CLM-2026-0212-1048
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:22:30 +0100
Message-ID: <CLM-20260212-152230-1048@acme-insurance.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"

Hello Mr. Zhang,

Perfect, thank you. Parfait, merci.
After we receive the photos/constat, we may:
- approve direct repair (réparation directe), or
- request an inspection (expertise) if needed.

If you choose a partner garage, they can often handle the estimate (devis) and paperwork.
Si vous préférez votre garage habituel, aucun souci—just ask them for a written estimate.

Please avoid repairing the vehicle before we confirm the process, sauf urgence sécurité.
If the headlight becomes unsafe to drive, tell us immediately.

Kind regards,
ACME Insurance Claims Desk

From: "ACME Insurance Claims" <auto.claims@acme-insurance.example>
To: "Chen Min" <chen.min@example.com>
Subject: Re: Auto claim follow-up / Suivi sinistre auto - Ref CLM-2026-0212-2231
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:11:00 +0100
Message-ID: <CLM-20260212-151100-2231@acme-insurance.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Language: en, fr
X-Priority: 3
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
X-Mailer: ACME Claims Desk 3.4
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello Ms. Chen,

Thank you for your email. Nous allons traiter votre sinistre auto.
To continue, could you please confirm:
- Your policy number (numéro de police)
- Vehicle plate (immatriculation)
- Accident date/time and location (date/heure et lieu)
- Whether anyone is injured (blessé / blessure)

Best regards,
ACME Insurance Claims


-----Original Message-----
From: "Chen Min" <chen.min@example.com>
To: "ACME Insurance Claims" <auto.claims@acme-insurance.example>
Subject: Accident de voiture / Car accident - claim request
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 14:52:26 +0100
Message-ID: <msg-20260212-145226@chen.min.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Bonjour,

J’ai eu un accident ce matin et je voudrais faire une déclaration de sinistre.
I’m not sure what steps to follow.

It happened in a parking lot, very low speed.
C’est un petit choc, mais mon pare-chocs arrière est abîmé.

Merci d’avance.


-----Original Message-----
From: "ACME Insurance Claims" <auto.claims@acme-insurance.example>
To: "Chen Min" <chen.min@example.com>
Subject: Re: Claim intake / Ouverture du dossier - Please send details
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 14:58:03 +0100
Message-ID: <CLM-20260212-145803-2231@acme-insurance.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello Ms. Chen,

Of course. Bien sûr, je vous explique.
To register the claim, please send:
1) Photos: your car (rear bumper), the other vehicle, and the scene (photos des véhicules + du lieu)
2) Any written statement or parking/security report (rapport du parking si disponible)
3) Other driver’s contact + plate (coordonnées + immatriculation)
4) If you have it, the accident statement (constat amiable), even if partially filled

Quick questions / Questions rapides:
- Did the other driver admit fault? (l’autre conducteur a reconnu sa faute ?)
- Was there any police involvement? (police sur place ?)
- Is the car drivable? (véhicule roulant ?)

Kind regards,
ACME Insurance Claims


-----Original Message-----
From: "Chen Min" <chen.min@example.com>
To: "ACME Insurance Claims" <auto.claims@acme-insurance.example>
Subject: Re: Claim intake - details
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:04:12 +0100
Message-ID: <msg-20260212-150412@chen.min.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi,

Policy number: LU-AUTO-334455
Plate: LU-MN2020

Accident: today at 09:35, Parking “Gare”, Luxembourg city.
Lieu: Parking près de la Gare, niveau -1.

No injuries. Pas de blessés.
No police. Pas de police, but the parking guard wrote a note.

Other driver:
- Name: Paul Martin
- Phone: +352 691 222 333
- Email: paul.martin@example.com
- Plate: LU-QR9090

He said “sorry” but didn’t clearly admit fault.
Il a dit désolé, mais il n’a pas signé tout de suite.

I attach 4 photos now; I can try to complete the constat tonight.
Je joins 4 photos.


-----Original Message-----
From: "ACME Insurance Claims" <auto.claims@acme-insurance.example>
To: "Chen Min" <chen.min@example.com>
Subject: Re: Claim registered / Sinistre enregistré - Ref CLM-2026-0212-2231
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:07:55 +0100
Message-ID: <CLM-20260212-150755-2231@acme-insurance.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello Ms. Chen,

We have registered your claim. Votre sinistre est enregistré.
Reference: CLM-2026-0212-2231

About liability / Responsabilité:
- If we receive a signed accident statement (constat amiable), it helps speed up the assessment.
- Sans constat signé, nous pouvons quand même avancer avec les photos et le rapport du parking, mais cela peut prendre un peu plus de temps.

Repairs / Réparations:
- Please do not repair the vehicle yet, unless it is a safety issue.
- Merci d’attendre notre feu vert, sauf urgence.

Could you confirm:
- Any visible cracks or detached parts on the bumper? (fissures / pièces détachées ?)
- Do you need a replacement car? (véhicule de remplacement ?)

Kind regards,
ACME Insurance Claims


-----Original Message-----
From: "Chen Min" <chen.min@example.com>
To: "ACME Insurance Claims" <auto.claims@acme-insurance.example>
Subject: Re: CLM-2026-0212-2231 - damage & rental car
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:10:21 +0100
Message-ID: <msg-20260212-151021@chen.min.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Bonjour,

Yes, there is a small crack on the bumper, and the paint is scraped.
Oui, petite fissure + peinture abîmée.

I might need a replacement car next week for work.
J’aurai peut-être besoin d’un véhicule de remplacement la semaine prochaine.

What should I do to get approval?
Merci.


-----Original Message-----
From: "ACME Insurance Claims" <auto.claims@acme-insurance.example>
To: "Chen Min" <chen.min@example.com>
Subject: Re: Replacement car & next steps / Véhicule de remplacement - CLM-2026-0212-2231
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:11:40 +0100
Message-ID: <CLM-20260212-151140-2231@acme-insurance.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello Ms. Chen,

Understood. Compris, merci.
For the replacement car (véhicule de remplacement):
- Please tell us the planned repair date (date de réparation) and the garage name.
- Once we validate coverage, we can issue an authorization (prise en charge) for the rental period.

Next steps / Prochaines étapes:
1) Please try to obtain a signed constat amiable, even if the other driver only confirms the parking-lot collision.
2) Ask a garage for an estimate (devis) with photos; send it to us by reply email.
3) If we need an inspection (expertise), we will schedule it within 1–3 business days.

If the bumper becomes loose or unsafe, stop driving and inform us immediately.
Si vous avez des questions, répondez à ce mail—English or français is fine.

Kind regards,
ACME Insurance Claims

From: "ACME Insurance Claims" <auto.claims@acme-insurance.example>
To: "Liu Fang" <liu.fang@example.com>
Subject: Re: Accident report / Déclaration sinistre auto - Ref CLM-2026-0212-3177
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:13:00 +0100
Message-ID: <CLM-20260212-151300-3177@acme-insurance.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Language: en, fr
X-Priority: 3
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
X-Mailer: ACME Claims Desk 3.4
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello Ms. Liu,

Thank you for contacting us. Nous sommes désolés pour l’incident.
We can open your auto claim today. To proceed, please confirm:
- Policy number (numéro de police)
- Vehicle plate (immatriculation)
- Date/time and exact location (date/heure et lieu exact)
- Any injuries? (blessés ?)
- Did you call assistance/towing? (dépannage / remorquage ?)

Kind regards,
ACME Insurance Claims Desk


-----Original Message-----
From: "Liu Fang" <liu.fang@example.com>
To: "ACME Insurance Claims" <auto.claims@acme-insurance.example>
Subject: Accident on highway / Accident sur autoroute - help
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 14:41:09 +0100
Message-ID: <msg-20260212-144109@liu.fang.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello,

I had an accident this afternoon and I’m not sure what to do next.
Bonjour, je voudrais faire une déclaration de sinistre auto.

It was on the A1 near Luxembourg, I hit the guardrail after avoiding debris.
C’était sur l’A1, j’ai touché la glissière en évitant un objet sur la route.

No other car involved (I think). No one is injured.
Pas d’autre voiture impliquée, et pas de blessés.

Please advise, thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: "ACME Insurance Claims" <auto.claims@acme-insurance.example>
To: "Liu Fang" <liu.fang@example.com>
Subject: Re: Safety + documents / Sécurité + documents à envoyer
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 14:47:52 +0100
Message-ID: <CLM-20260212-144752-3177@acme-insurance.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello Ms. Liu,

First, are you safe now? D’abord, êtes-vous en sécurité ?
If the vehicle is on the hard shoulder or unsafe, please call emergency services or roadside assistance.

To handle this claim (sinistre), please send when possible:
1) Photos of the vehicle damage and the location (photos des dommages + du lieu)
2) Any police report or motorway assistance report (rapport police / autoroute)
3) Your driver’s license and vehicle registration (permis + carte grise)
4) A short description of what happened (description des circonstances)

Also please confirm:
- Was the car drivable? (véhicule roulant ?)
- Did you notice damage to wheels/suspension? (roue / suspension ?)
- Any witnesses? (témoins ?)

Kind regards,
ACME Insurance Claims Desk


-----Original Message-----
From: "Liu Fang" <liu.fang@example.com>
To: "ACME Insurance Claims" <auto.claims@acme-insurance.example>
Subject: Re: Safety + documents - details
Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 14:55:18 +0100
Message-ID: <msg-20260212-145518@liu.fang.example>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi,

I’m safe now, thank you. Je suis rentrée à la maison.
Policy number: LU-AUTO-990011
Plate: LU-ZX8080

Time: 13:20 today. Location: A1 direction Trier, near exit 9.
Lieu: A1 vers Trèves, près de la sortie 9.

I called roadside assistance; they towed the car.
J’ai appelé le dépannage, la voiture a été remorquée.

No police report yet. I can request the assistance report.
Pas de rapport de police, mais je peux demander le rapport du dépanneur.

Damage: front right wheel area + bumper, maybe suspension.
Dommages: roue avant droite + pare-chocs, peut-être suspension.

I attach 6 photos.
Je joins 6 photos.


-----Original Mes

From: "ACME Insurance - Health Claims" To: "Wang Lan" Cc: "Health Claims Intake" Subject: Re: Medical claim / Remboursement santé - Ref HCLM-2026-0212-8840 Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:14:00 +0100 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Language: en, fr X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: ACME Claims Desk 3.4 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_8840_02122026" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit ------=_Part_8840_02122026 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hello Ms. Wang, Thank you for your email. Nous confirmons la réception de votre demande de remboursement santé. We can open a medical insurance claim file and guide you through the next steps. To proceed, please confirm the following: - Policy number (numéro de police) and member ID (numéro d’adhérent) - Patient name (nom du patient) if different from the policyholder - Date(s) of treatment (date(s) de soins) - Provider/clinic name (nom du médecin / clinique) - Country of treatment (pays de soins) Documents needed / Pièces à fournir: 1) Itemized invoice (facture détaillée) with provider details (cachet/tampon if available) 2) Proof of payment (preuve de paiement): receipt, bank statement excerpt, or card slip 3) Medical prescription or referral if relevant (ordonnance / lettre d’orientation), for example physiotherapy 4) A short medical note / report if hospitalization or imaging is involved (compte-rendu), only if applicable 5) Your reimbursement form (formulaire de remboursement) if your plan requires it Important / Important: - Please do not send full card numbers; mask sensitive details. - Nous vous remercions de ne pas partager de données inutiles (ex. numéro complet de carte). Could you tell us if this is: - Outpatient (soins ambulatoires) or hospitalization (hospitalisation)? - Routine care or an accident-related treatment (accident)? Kind regards, ACME Insurance - Health Claims Team -----Original Message----- From: "Wang Lan" To: "ACME Insurance - Health Claims" Subject: Reimbursement request / Demande de remboursement - doctor visit Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 14:38:25 +0100 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hi, I’d like to claim reimbursement for a medical expense. Bonjour, je souhaite demander un remboursement santé. I had a doctor visit + blood test last week and I paid upfront. J’ai payé d’avance pour une consultation + prise de sang. What do you need from me? Merci. -----Original Message----- From: "ACME Insurance - Health Claims" To: "Wang Lan" Subject: Re: Reimbursement request / Informations nécessaires Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 14:45:10 +0100 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hello Ms. Wang, Of course. Bien sûr, je vous explique. To open the claim, please send: - Policy number / member ID (numéro de police / adhérent) - The invoice(s) (facture(s)) and proof of payment (preuve de paiement) - Date of service (date de soins) and provider name/address If you have multiple documents, you can attach PDFs in one email. Si vous avez des documents en photo, assurez-vous qu’ils soient lisibles (montant, date, nom du prestataire). Kind regards, ACME Insurance - Health Claims Team -----Original Message----- From: "Wang Lan" To: "ACME Insurance - Health Claims" Subject: Re: Documents for reimbursement Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 14:59:54 +0100 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hello, Policy number: LU-HEALTH-120034 Member ID: MB-778812 Patient: Wang Lan (same as policyholder). Treatment: - 05 Feb 2026: GP consultation (consultation médecin généraliste) - 06 Feb 2026: Blood test (analyse sanguine) at Lab Central Country: Luxembourg. I attach: 1) Invoice GP.pdf 2) Invoice Lab.pdf 3) Receipt.pdf Total paid: 186.40 EUR. Montant total: 186,40 EUR. Merci. -----Original Message----- From: "ACME Insurance - Health Claims" To: "Wang Lan" Subject: Re: Claim registered / Dossier ouvert - Ref HCLM-2026-0212-8840 Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:05:32 +0100 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hello Ms. Wang, Thank you—documents received. Merci, nous avons bien reçu les pièces jointes. Your health claim file is now registered. Votre dossier est ouvert. Reference: HCLM-2026-0212-8840 Next steps / Prochaines étapes: - We will verify eligibility and coverage under your plan (vérification des garanties). - We may request additional details if an invoice is not itemized (facture non détaillée) or if a code is missing. Expected timeline / Délai indicatif: - Standard reimbursement review is usually completed within 5–10 business days after receiving complete documents. Could you please confirm: - Did you receive any prescription (ordonnance) linked to the blood test? - Was this related to a chronic condition (affection de longue durée) or a one-time check-up? Kind regards, ACME Insurance - Health Claims Team -----Original Message----- From: "Wang Lan" To: "ACME Insurance - Health Claims" Subject: Re: HCLM-2026-0212-8840 - additional info Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:09:18 +0100 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hi, No prescription, it was a routine check-up. Pas d’ordonnance, c’était un contrôle de routine. It’s not a chronic condition. Ce n’est pas une maladie chronique. Also, do you reimburse the lab test separately or together? Est-ce que le labo est remboursé séparément ? Thanks / merci. -----Original Message----- From: "ACME Insurance - Health Claims" To: "Wang Lan" Subject: Re: Reimbursement method / Modalités de remboursement - HCLM-2026-0212-8840 Date: Thu, 12 Feb 2026 15:12:44 +0100 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hello Ms. Wang, Thank you for confirming. Merci pour votre retour. Regarding your question: - We review each invoice line according to the benefits in your plan (selon le tableau des garanties). - In practice, the GP consultation and lab test may be reimbursed as separate items (postes séparés), even if submitted together. Payment / Paiement: - If approved, reimbursement is paid by bank transfer (virement bancaire). - Please confirm your IBAN, or send it in a separate message (you may mask some digits). Veuillez éviter d’envoyer des informations sensibles inutiles. If we need anything else, we will contact you by email. Si vous avez d’autres factures liées à la même période, vous pouvez les envoyer en répondant à ce fil. Kind regards, ACME Insurance - Health Claims Team ------=_Part_8840_02122026 Content-Type: text/html; charset="UTF-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello Ms. Wang,

Thank you for your email.
Nous confirmons la réception de votre demande de remboursement santé. We can open a medical insurance claim file and guide you through the next steps.

Reference: HCLM-2026-0212-8840

Documents needed / Pièces à fournir:

  • Itemized invoice (facture détaillée) + provider details
  • Proof of payment (preuve de paiement)
  • Prescription/referral if relevant (ordonnance / orientation)

If approved, reimbursement is paid by bank transfer (virement bancaire).
Veuillez éviter d’envoyer des informations sensibles inutiles.

Kind regards,
ACME Insurance - Health Claims Team

------=_Part_8840_02122026--
